attributes.action: KEEP JEREMY CORBYN AS THE LABOUR PARTY LEADER
attributes.additional_details: When there was a million man march in London, many MPS and ordinary citizens went against Tony Blair on the issues regarding the Iraq war, yet Blair ignored everyone and still went ahead to murder hundreds of thousands of Iraqi civilians. HOW MANY OF THE LABOUR MPS RESIGNED AT THAT TIME? NO WHERE NEAR ENOUGH AS THEY ARE NOW! This hypocricy needs to end. We are loyal to Corbyn and will support him!
attributes.background: We the public have confidence in Jeremy Corbyn and stand by him in his decisions! Jeremy Corbyn has been undergoing a variety of criticisms from his unloyal party members and we believe they need to stand by their leader and support him for a brighter future for the British public.
